mil.emp3.mapengine.events

Class MapInstanceViewChangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.events.Event<MapViewEventEnum,IMapInstance>
      • mil.emp3.mapengine.events.MapInstanceViewChangeEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvent<MapViewEventEnum,IMapInstance>

    public class MapInstanceViewChangeEvent
extends Event<MapViewEventEnum,IMapInstance>
    This class implements the Map Instance View Change Event. It must be generated by all map engine instances when the viewing area of the map changes. All events of this type are handled by the EMP core code.

      This constructor must be called by the map engines to creates a MapInstanceViewChangeEvent event

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapInstanceViewChangeEvent

        public MapInstanceViewChangeEvent(IMapInstance oMapInstance,
                          MapViewEventEnum viewEventEnum,
                          ICamera camera,
                          ILookAt lookAt,
                          org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoBounds bounds,
                          int iWidth,
                          int iHeight)
        This constructor must be called by the map engines to creates a MapInstanceViewChangeEvent event
        Parameters:
        oMapInstance - The actual map instance. The this property of the object that implements the IMapInstance interface.
        viewEventEnum - The view event generated. See MapViewEventEnum
        camera - The new camera position of the view of the map. See ICamera.
        bounds - The new view bounds.
